tool.name: ReduceAddHydrogens
tool.description: : Adds hydrogen atoms to small molecules.

param.name: input_path
param.label: input PDB file
param.help: Path to the input file. Format: [input].pdb

param.name: outname_output_path
param.label: output PDB name
param.help: Path to the output file Format: [output].pdb

param.name: sele
param.label: Take tool settings:
param.help: Select where tool settings are to be read from

param.name: properties
param.label: Configuration file
param.help: File containing tool settings. See below for the syntax

param.name: jsonstr
param.label: JSON string
param.help: JSON string containing tool settings. See below for the syntax

param.name: flip
param.label: flip
param.help: add H and rotate and flip NQH groups

param.name: noflip
param.label: noflip
param.help: add H and rotate groups with no NQH flips

param.name: nuclear
param.label: nuclear
param.help: use nuclear X-H distances rather than default electron cloud distances

param.name: nooh
param.label: nooh
param.help: remove hydrogens on OH and SH groups

param.name: oh
param.label: oh
param.help: add hydrogens on OH and SH groups (default)

param.name: his
param.label: his
param.help: create NH hydrogens on HIS rings (usually used with -HIS)

param.name: noheth
param.label: noheth
param.help: do not attempt to add NH proton on Het groups

param.name: rotnh3
param.label: rotnh3
param.help: allow lysine NH3 to rotate (default)

param.name: norotnh3
param.label: norotnh3
param.help: do not allow lysine NH3 to rotate

param.name: rotexist
param.label: rotexist
param.help: to rotate

param.name: rotexoh
param.label: rotexoh
param.help: allow existing OH & SH groups to rotate

param.name: allalt
param.label: allalt
param.help: process adjustments for all conformations (default)

param.name: onlya
param.label: onlya
param.help: only adjust 'A' conformations

param.name: charges
param.label: charges
param.help: output charge state for appropriate hydrogen records

param.name: dorotmet
param.label: dorotmet
param.help: allow methionine methyl groups to rotate (not recommended)

param.name: noadjust
param.label: noadjust
param.help: do not process any rot or flip adjustments

param.name: build
param.label: build
param.help: add H, including His sc NH, then rotate and flip groups (except for pre-existing methionine methyl hydrogens)

param.name: reduce_path
param.label: reduce_path
param.help: Path to the reduce executable binary.

param.name: remove_tmp
param.label: remove_tmp
param.help: [WF property] Remove temporal files.

param.name: restart
param.label: restart
param.help: [WF property] Do not execute if output files exist.
